resources:
I-Droid Dashcam - Ukushayela i-DVR
Noma yikuphi Vala Okuzenzakalelayo Ikhutshaziwe (Ngaphandle kokukhangisa) sondeza khipha Akwaziwa
Ikhamera I-diaphragm Ikhamera yangemuva Udinga ukusebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza kanye ukuze ukwazi ukufinyelela ikhamera ngemuva Ku-Android 11+, ngaphambi kokuqala ukurekhoda ngemuva, uhlelo lokusebenza kufanele lusebenze futhi lubonakale okungenani kanye ukuze lukwazi ukusebenzisa ikhamera engemuva. Ngakho-ke, ngemva kokuqalisa kabusha idivayisi, yenza uhlelo lokusebenza lubonakale futhi ngemva kwalokho ungavali isevisi yokuqopha, kufanele ihlale esikhungweni sezaziso. I-DroidDashcam: Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo kumile ngoba ikhamera isetshenziswa olunye uhlelo lokusebenza I-DroidDashcam: Ukurekhodwa kwevidiyo kumile ngoba ikhamera yedivayisi iyekile ukusebenza Ikhamera ye-USB yangaphandle Ubude bokugxila Ama-engeli wokubuka (16: 9) mpo evundlile Ikhamera yangaphambili Ikhamera ibisetshenziswa olunye uhlelo lokusebenza. Sicela ungasebenzisi ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza okungenzeka zisebenzisa ikhamera ngenkathi uqopha ividiyo. I-Android ivumela uhlelo lokusebenza olulodwa kuphela ukusebenzisa ikhamera ngesikhathi Ikhamera okwamanje (beyikade) ayitholakali ukuze ivuleke kudivayisi yakho (iphutha lesistimu yekhamera) Kwenzeke iphutha ngenkathi kusetshenziswa ikhamera.
Le divayisi ayinayo ikhamera eyakhelwe ngaphakathi futhi ayisekeli amakhamera angaphandle. Iyavala… Ikhamera ayitholakali Vula izilungiselelo Bika iphutha Khetha ikhamera Yeqa Vula ividiyo yamanje ukuthi ingalotshwa\?
Siyabonga kakhulu ngokusekela kwakho! Ukuze ususe izikhangiso, umnikelo kufanele ube noma ngaphezulu. Awunazo izikhangiso. Ileveli yomnikelo wakho: Ulwazi lokuthenga alukalayishwa okwamanje. Ingabe uku-inthanethi futhi ungene ngemvume ku-akhawunti yakho ye-Google\? Gcina nyanga zonke (azikho izikhangiso zanoma yiliphi inani) Zikhiphe ohlwini
Ubude Izixhumanisi I-Gigabyte Hz kbps Mbps m imiz. Isivinini se-GPS km/h mph
I-Droid Dashcam ayikhishiwe ekulungiselelweni kwebhethri. Uma ikhamera ingasebenzi ngemuva noma enye into, ngeza lolu hlelo lokusebenza ngaphandle kwemodi yokonga amandla. Uma uphinde wafaka uhlelo ku-Android 11, amafayela amadala kufanele asuswe ngesandla Ukulawulwa kwekhamera kulahlekile ku-DroidDashcam. Sicela uvule i-DroidDashcam futhi ukuze uphinde ukwazi ukulawula ikhamera. Ukuthuthukisa Ibhethri -> Zonke Izinhlelo Zokusebenza -> I-Droid Dashcam -> Ungakhulisi /Ulondoloze I-DroidDashcam: Ikhamera iyeke ukusebenza kungalindelekile, iqala kabusha… Ikhamera ayisebenzi Vala izintandokazi zohlelo lokusebenza ngaphambi kokuqala ukurekhoda Yehlulekile ukuvula imakrofoni, ukurekhoda kuzoqhubeka ngaphandle komsindo Ayikwazanga ukuvula lezi zilungiselelo kulolu hlelo lokusebenza, sicela uzame ukuzithola usebenzisa uhlelo lokusebenza oluzenzakalelayo lwezilungiselelo zedivayisi Yehlulekile ukuvula uhlelo lokusebenza… Yehlulekile ukuqala iwindi elintantayo Inzwa ye-G ithole ukushaqeka, ividiyo izovinjwa ukuthi ibhalwe phezu Kubonakala sengathi ulufakile kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza. Unamavidiyo amadala uhlelo lokusebenza olungakwazi ukuwasusa ngesikhathi sokurekhoda. Wasuse mathupha esikrinini sevidiyo ngaphambi kokurekhoda amavidiyo amasha. Kusukela ku-Android 11+, uhlelo lokusebenza lulahlekelwa amalungelo okufinyelela kumafayela amadala ngemva kokufakwa kabusha. Noma unganikeza imvume yokubhala kufolda yokurekhoda Kutholwe amafayela evidiyo amadala Ifolda engavumelekile. Sicela ungashintshi indlela. Kufanele unikeze imvume yefolda ethile. Ungashintsha ifolda yokurekhoda kuzilungiselelo. Iyaqaliswa… Sicela ulinde! Sicela ufake uhlelo lokusebenza lwewebhu ukuze uvule isixhumanisi Ayikho isignali ye-GPS Ayikho inethiwekhi yokuthola ikheli, noma zama ukuqalisa kabusha idivayisi Yehlulekile ukususa ifayela levidiyo. Kungenzeka ukuthi ulufake kabusha uhlelo lokusebenza futhi imvume yefayela yalahleka, sicela uzame ukulikhipha mathupha Khulula isikhala ukuze uqhubeke uqopha ividiyo Ayikho inkumbulo eyanele Yehlulekile ukuthatha isithombe Isithombe silondoloziwe Vala ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza usebenzisa ikhamera bese uqala kabusha lolu hlelo lokusebenza Ifolda yokurekhoda ishintshiwe. Ngoba imvume yokugcina (yokubhala) ayitholakali noma ayikho Susa amavidiyo amadala, fometha ikhadi lakho le-SD, noma uzame elinye. Futhi, khawulela indawo enkulu yokuqopha ividiyo (okuncane kungcono). Inani elikhulu lamavidiyo alondoloziwe lingabangela izinkinga ezinjalo. Bona futhi i-FAQ mayelana namakhadi e-SD kokuthi Izilungiselelo /Imibuzo Evame Ukubuzwa. Ungazama nokubhalela imemori yefoni esikhundleni sekhadi langaphandle Misa ukurekhoda. Ayikho inkumbulo eyanele ukuqhubeka Misa ukurekhoda… (izilungiselelo zivuliwe) Qala umise ukurekhoda, bese ungavala isevisi Sicela ulinde isekhondi ngaphambi kokumisa ukurekhoda ngokushesha ngemva kokuqala Ukuze ushintshe ikhamera, kufanele umise ukurekhoda kwamanje Ukuze uvale le sevisi, qala unciphise noma uvale uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-Droid Dashcam Ividiyo izovinjwa ukuthi ibhalwe phezu. Usayizi wawo wonke amavidiyo asuka kusayizi ovunyelwe Ividiyo ikhiyiwe futhi igciniwe, ividiyo elandelayo nayo izomakwa njengekhiyiwe (ingakhanselwa ngokuchofoza inkinobho) Awekho amandla ebhethri anele kudivayisi. Khokha noma uqale ukurekhoda uma inkokhiso ingaphezulu kuka-1%% Kukhona okungahambanga kahle ngerekhoda yevidiyo. Iphekhi yolimi ye-TTS (Android Text-to-Speech) ayifakiwe. Vula i-inthanethi ukuze uqale ukulanda Umise isevisi yangemuva yokuqalisa ividiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo. Vula uhlelo lokusebenza lwe-DroidDashcam ukuze uluqalise futhi.
ijekhi yomsindo (Aux) bluetooth ukuhlaziya ukushaja Chofoza kusaziso ukuze uqalise uhlelo lokusebenza. Awunayo imvume phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza noma idivayisi ikhiyiwe Yehlulekile ukuqala isevisi yokurekhoda ekuqaliseni idivayisi Ima Okokuvula /kuvaliwe ukurekhoda Isevisi yokurekhoda yehlulekile ukuqala. Thepha ukuze ukhubaze ukulungiselelwa kwebhethri kulolu hlelo lokusebenza
Umsindo uyadingeka ukuze urekhode ithrekhi yomsindo lapho uqopha ividiyo Ukulungiswa Komsindo Ikhamera iyadingeka ukuze kuqoshwe ividiyo kanye nokuhlola kuqala kwekhamera. Ukulungiswa kwekhamera Lolu hlelo lokusebenza ludinga imvume yokusebenzisa ikhamera ukurekhoda ividiyo. Kodwa wenqaba. Iyavala… Zama ukunikeza imvume kukhamera kuzilungiselelo zesistimu zalolu hlelo lokusebenza Uma incishisiwe, i-Droid Dashcam isebenzisa indawo engemuva ukuze idwebe izixhumanisi, ikheli kanye nesivinini kuvidiyo erekhodiwe. Ku-Android 11 (R), udinga ukukhetha mathupha okuthi \"Ngaso sonke isikhathi (noma iyiphi imodi)\" kuzintandokazi zesistimu ukuze uvumele indawo engemuva. Izilungiselelo zizovuleka ngemva kwaleli windi. Indawo iyadingeka ukuze kunqunywe isivinini sokuthutha kusetshenziswa idatha ye-GPS, ikheli lamanje nezixhumanisi ukuze ziboniswe esikrinini kanye nokurekhoda imibhalo engezansi kuvidiyo. Imvume yendawo Isitoreji siyadingeka ukuze ulondoloze ividiyo kufolda eyabelwe kanye nemodi yokuqopha loop Imvume yesitoreji Ukulungiswa komsindo nendawo Umsindo, Indawo kanye Nesitolo Semvume Isitoreji somsindo nemvume Ikhamera kanye Nokulungiswa Kwendawo Nikeza amalungelo Izimvume zendawo nesitoreji
Ikhutshaziwe ngoba idivayisi ayisekeli i-geocoding Bonisa ukugqwayiza eduze kwenkinobho ukuze uqale ukurekhoda Irekhoda opopayi I-Bitrate (ikhwalithi) Imvamisa yesampula Ukurekhoda komsindo Ikhwalithi, ivaliwe /ekurekhodweni komsindo Izilungiselelo zomsindo Isitiriyo Qala ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo uma uhlelo luqala Uma uqala uhlelo lokusebenza I-AUX (ijekhi yomsindo) I-Bluetooth Khetha idivayisi ye-Bluetooth noma iyiphi Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho idivayisi ye-bluetooth ixhunyiwe. Ukuze isevisi yokulandela i-bluetooth iqale ngemva kokuba idivayisi isiqaliswe kabusha, kuyadingeka ukuthi idivayisi (isikrini) ivulwe uma kukhona iphasiwedi. Yethula uma uxhuma idivayisi ye-bluetooth Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho uhlelo luqala, idivayisi (isikrini) kufanele ivulwe uma kukhona iphasiwedi. Ngemva kokulayisha, kungathatha imizuzu embalwa ngaphambi kokuthi isistimu yazise uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi iyaqalisa. Lapho isistimu iqala Uma ishaja Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho ishaja. Ukuze isevisi yokulandelela ukushaja iqale ngemva kokuba idivayisi isiqaliswe kabusha, idivayisi (isikrini) kufanele ivulwe uma kunephasiwedi. Qala uma ukushaja kuxhunyiwe Yima lapho ukhipha idivayisi ye-bluetooth Yima lapho ushaja nqamula Iqala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalelayo lapho ixhunywe kujekhi yomsindo (AUX) Qalisa uma ixhunywe kujekhi yomsindo (AUX) Yima lapho unqanyulwa kujekhi yomsindo (AUX) Ayikho imvume enikeziwe. Kuyadingeka ukubuyekeza isivinini, ikheli kanye nezixhumanisi ngenkathi uqopha ividiyo ngemuva. Chofoza lapha ukuze uyilungise manje Indawo ngemuva Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kungavimbela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi lusebenze kahle (isibonelo, ukusebenzisa ikhamera noma ukubuyekeza indawo kuyilapho uqopha ividiyo ngemuva). Chofoza lapha ukuze uyikhubaze kulolu hlelo lokusebenza manje Ukulungiselela ibhethri Okuzenzakalelayo (imini /ubusuku), ngesikhathi Usuku Ebusuku Nikela Umnikelo, Susa Izikhangiso Sekela ukuthuthukiswa kohlelo lokusebenza Umnikelo Imibuzo ejwayelekile ukubuzwa Usayizi wezinkinobho efasiteleni elintantayo kusuka ngaphambili (usuku kuphela, uzinzile) (imini nobusuku) (izicelo zenethiwekhi ezivamile) Phezulu Phansi Okuvamile Phezulu kakhulu Iphansi kakhulu Ziba idatha ye-GPS enephutha elingenhla Bonisa isexwayiso uma i-GPS ne-Google geolocation kukhutshaziwe Bonisa isexwayiso kuphela uma i-GPS ivaliwe Ungabonisi inkinobho yesixwayiso neyokulungisa Isexwayiso se-GPS sikhutshaziwe, inkinobho yokulungisa Ulwazi /Okwengeziwe… Kukhona izilungiselelo kudivayisi yakho ukuvumela izinhlelo zokusebenza ukuthi zidlale ngokuzenzakalela futhi zisebenze ngemuva. Chofoza lapha bese wengeza uhlelo lokusebenza kokuhlukile (vumela i-autostart nokunye) ukuyivumela ukuthi isebenze ngemuva nalapho isikrini sicinyiwe, uma kunqatshelwe. Ivumela umsebenzi ongemuva Akukhethiwe Inkinobho Yokuqalisa Isicelo Isiphathi Sendawo (sihoxisiwe) Buyekeza indawo usebenzisa i-GPS kuphela (ungasebenzisi inethiwekhi) Uma amanani esivinini emabi, bese uzama indlela endala. Uma amanani enguziro noma engavamile ukubuyekezwa, zama indlela entsha Indlela yokutholwa kwendawo (GPS) Izinga lokuvuselelwa kwe-GPS amamitha wokunemba I-Optical Zoom (Sondeza) /Ubude be-Focal Ukuma kwezwe I-albhamu ibuyele emuva Ukuma ngobude Susa ngokuzenzakalelayo amavidiyo amadala ngenkathi uqopha uma singekho isikhala esanele samavidiyo amasha Ukuqoshwa kweluphu Shiya isikrini sivuliwe Vula ukuze usebenzise amamayela esikhundleni samakhilomitha Bonisa ngamamayela, izinyawo Indawo yesithombe (ifolda /indlela) Indawo yevidiyo (ifolda /indlela) Indawo yevidiyo (gcina ifolda), ubude bevidiyo, ukuqoshwa kweluphu, inzwa ye-G, i-GPS Ezinye izilungiselelo Ikheli lendawo yamanje Ukuphakama ngaphezu kwezinga lolwandle Izixhumanisi Isivinini samanje Izinto ezizoboniswa esikrinini Ubude bevidiyo - ukonga kangaki Yethula uhlelo lokusebenza Izinkinobho /izakhi efasiteleni elintantayo Vala iwindi Hudula iwindi Bonisa isivinini Vula isikrini sevidiyo Sondeza ngeminwe emibili Nika amandla ukusondeza kwesikrini Inqubomgomo yobumfihlo Linganisela uhlelo lokusebenza ku-Google Play Isitolo Linganisa Izincomo Ukutholwa kokunyakaza ngekhamera Vimba ividiyo ekususeni ngokuzenzakalelayo (bhala phezu kwayo) uma kutholwa ukushaya Inzwa ye-G (inzwa yokushaqeka) Ukuzwela kwenzwa ye-G Ukudlidliza lapho kutholwa ukwethuka Qala ukurekhoda uma ukunyakaza kutholwa Qala ukurekhoda uma ijubane lilingana /liphakeme (kusekelwe ku-GPS) Misa ukuqopha ngemva Misa ukurekhoda uma kungekho umnyakazo Misa ukurekhoda uma ijubane liphansi (kusekelwe ku-GPS) Umthamo omkhulu wememori wawo wonke amavidiyo (ukurekhoda kweluphu) Uma uqala uhlelo, vula /vala ukushaja, qalisa uhlelo Qala ukurekhoda ngokuzenzakalela Ukucindezela isikrini ngokushesha /isikhathi eside, ukuvala isikrini, ikheli nokuboniswa kwesivinini, iwindi le-popup, izinkinobho nokuningi Isixhumi esibonakalayo (UI) Ishintsha ngokuzenzakalela izindlela zekhamera zemini /zasebusuku ngezikhathi ezithile Izilungiselelo zosuku oluzenzakalelayo /zasebusuku I-bitrate ephezulu - ikhwalithi engcono, kodwa usayizi wefayela wevidiyo omkhulu I-FPS eyengeziwe - ividiyo ebushelelezi, kodwa ibhethri liphela ngokushesha. Kungcono ukusetha inani lokuqala libe eliphansi kakhulu (eyesibili lingase libe phezulu) ukuze kuqoshwe kangcono ebumnyameni Thumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza kubangani bakho Yabelana ngalokhu Vuliwe /vala ukurekhodwa komsindo Izinkinobho zokushintsha amakhamera, ukuvula /ukuvala ukuqoshwa komsindo, i-flash, imodi yasebusuku, ukuvimba ividiyo ekubhalweni ngaphezulu Izinkinobho esikrinini Ushintsho lwekhamera Imini /Ebusuku /Amamodi Okuzenzakalelayo I-Flash ivuliwe /icishiwe Ivimba amavidiyo ukuthi abhalwe phezu Ibonisa iwindi elinezinkinobho zokulawula phezu kwazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza Bonisa iwindi elintantayo Bonisa ibha yesimo sesistimu Ukwenza isithombe Ikheli, isivinini, izixhumanisi I-elekthronikhi (yedijithali, i-EIS) - kunconyiwe Ayisekelwe ikhamera yamanje. Abakhiqizi bavame ukukhawulela ukusetshenziswa kwayo - itholakala kuphela kuhlelo lokusebenza olujwayelekile lwekhamera I-Optical (OIS) Umsindo ekuqaleni, ima noma iphutha lokurekhoda Isimo somsindo oqoshiwe Ikheli Khetha umbala wesihlokwana Izixhumanisi Isibonelo, ipuleti lelayisense Umbhalo owengeziwe Ifomethi yedethi Idethi Isikhathi) Uhlelo Imibhalo engezansi yesiNgisi Imbondela yamagama-ncazo wevidiyo: Idethi (isikhathi), ikheli lendawo, izixhumanisi nesivinini Izilungiselelo zombhalo ongezansi Khulisa usayizi wombhalo Isivinini (okucacile) Ifomethi yesikhathi Ukungafihli kombhalo Uma izibuyekezo zivame kakhulu, ibhethri izophela ngokushesha Izinga lokubuyekezwa kwekheli Bika iphutha, ukuphahlazeka noma wenze umnikelo Ukusekela (impendulo) Vumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ukuthi luvele phezu kwazo zonke ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza. Lokhu kuyadingeka ukuze uqale/umise ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo ngokuzenzakalelayo noma ukuveza iwindi elintantayo Ukulungiswa phezu kwawo wonke amawindi Buyela esikrinini sasekhaya (okurekhodiwe) ukuze usebenzise lesi silungiselelo bese uqala isevisi yokulandelela Izilungiselelo Akukho okumele ukwenze Qala /yeka ukurekhoda Thepha ngokushesha esikrinini Cindezela isikhathi eside esikrinini imizuzwana imizuzwana okwesibili imizuzwana Inguqulo yohlelo lokusebenza I-Bitrate (ikhwalithi) Imodi yesigcawu sokulawula ikhamera (Ebusuku) Imodi Yesigcawu Sokulawula Ikhamera (Usuku) Okujwayelekile /Okubalulekile Okubhekana Nakho I-HDR (High Dynamic Range) Ubusuku (ngezimo zokukhanya okuphansi) Isikhathi sokuphuma kwelanga (Sunrise) Isikhathi sokushona kwelanga (ukushona kwelanga) Imini, ubusuku noma imodi ezenzakalelayo Isinxephezelo sokuvezwa (ubusuku) Isinxephezelo sokuvezwa (usuku) Isibuko esivundlile sevidiyo. Isithombe sishintsha kuphela ekurekhodweni kwevidiyo, ukubuka kuqala akushintshi Phenya ividiyo ngokuvundlile Isithombe esiqhubekayo Ividiyo eqhubekayo (inconyiwe phakathi nosuku) Okungapheli (kunconyiwe ebusuku) Ukugxila kwekhamera (ubusuku) Ukugxila kwekhamera (usuku) Amafreyimu ngesekhondi (FPS) Rekhoda ngefomethi ye-HEVC (H.265) ukuze wonge isikhala. Ungase ungakwazi ukudlala amavidiyo anjalo kwezinye izisetshenziswa zokudlala amavidiyo noma izinhlelo zokusebenza. Izosetha kabusha ukulungiswa kanye ne-bitrate ngemva koshintsho Ukurekhoda kwevidiyo okuphumelelayo kakhulu Ukuma kwevidiyo nefoni Ukulungiswa kwevidiyo Ukulungiswa, isilinganiso sebhithi, umumo, ukugxila, ikhamera, imodi yasebusuku Izilungiselelo zevidiyo Usayizi omkhulu - ukuphuma kwebhethri ngokushesha Okungenamkhawulo Ukuqiniswa kwevidiyo Ukusondeza kwedijithali (zoom)
Okuzenzakalelayo Ukulungisa Ukulungisa Iyatholakala amasathelayithi amasathelayithi isathelayithi amasathelayithi Indawo Gps Net Valiwe Kuhlanganisa.
Qala ukurekhoda Iphutha lokuqala ukurekhoda Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo entsha ngomsindo oqoshiwe sekuqalile ukurekhoda kuqalile Ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo entsha kuqale ngaphandle kokurekhoda komsindo Asikho isitoreji esanele. Indawo yamahhala Misa ukurekhoda Ayikwazanga ukuqedela ukurekhoda ngendlela efanele ukurekhoda kumisiwe Iyarekhoda… Ukuqopha sekuqalile Ukurekhoda kumisiwe
Yehlulekile ukuqalisa isevisi ye-Droid Dashcam ukuze iqalise ngokuzenzakalela /iyeke ukurekhoda ngenxa yokuthi imvume ye-SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (bonisa kuwo wonke amawindi ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza) ayizange inikezwe. Noma idivayisi ibikhiyiwe kuleli phuzu (umkhawulo we-Android ukuthi idivayisi kufanele iqale ivulwe futhi isikrini sayo kufanele sivulwe ngaphambi kokuthi isevisi yokuqoshwa kwevidiyo okuzenzakalelayo iqalise) Uma uvula idivayisi
Ikhadi le-MicroSD Ikhadi le-MicroSD Imemori yefoni Imemori yefoni
ividiyo ividiyo Isusa amafayela… Sicela ulinde! Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa leli fayela levidiyo\? Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa lawa mafayela evidiyo\? Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa le folda yevidiyo\? Uqinisekile ukuthi ufuna ukususa idatha yefolda yevidiyo\? Susa amafayela evidiyo Susa amafolda evidiyo Amavidiyo alahlekile Vimbela le vidiyo ekususweni ngokuzenzakalela (bhala phezu)\? Susa imodi Yabelana ngalokhu Buka Hlunga Ngokwenyuka Hlunga ngokwehla Ifayela levidiyo lihanjiswe kufolda evikelekile Phuma kwimodi yokususa Bhala ngaphezulu kuvikelwe Susa Vuselela Khetha konke Iyahlunga Inkumbulo Sicela uvule izilungiselelo zohlelo bese uvumela ukufinyelela endaweni yokugcina kumemori yefoni Ayikho imvume yokugcina Khetha amafayela evidiyo ozowasusa Khetha isitoreji sevidiyo Amavidiyo anesikhathi Ukuqoshwa kwamavidiyo
Ngicela ulinde. Uhlu lohlelo lokusebenza lusalayisha… Izixwayiso Isiginali ekuqaleni kokuqoshwa kwefayela levidiyo elilandelayo Bhephu uma uqopha Uhlelo Lokuhumusha Siza ukuthuthukisa noma ukulungisa ukuhumushwa kombhalo ngolimi lwakho Yethula uhlelo lokusebenza uma ukuqoshwa kwevidiyo kuqala
Kwenzeke iphutha ngenkathi ufinyelela ikhamera. Ukuthuthukisa ibhethri kunikwe amandla Khubaza ukulungiselelwa kwebhethri kwalolu hlelo lokusebenza kuzilungiselelo zedivayisi yakho ukuze ugweme amaphutha ekhamera azayo
Ukurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo kuphela uma isevisi isebenza Uma unika amandla le nketho, khona-ke ukurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo ngeke kwenziwe uma isevisi yokuqapha ingasebenzi futhi ingabonakali kuphaneli yezaziso.
Imibhalo engezansi ngezansi Imbondela imibhalo engezansi ngaphansi kwevidiyo
Ngiyamukela
Nge-Android 11 nangaphezulu, ungase ungakwazi ukukhetha noma yiziphi izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifakiwe njengoba isistimu ngokwayo ikhawulela ukubonakala kohlelo lokusebenza (inqubomgomo yobumfihlo)
Irekhoda kuphela uma idivayisi ishaja
Gcina isikrini sivuliwe kuphela uma urekhoda usuku nesikhathi
Vula uhlelo lokusebenza uma ukurekhoda kuqala ngokuzenzakalelayo
Isikrini esikhulu sohlelo lokusebenza asikwazanga ukuqaliswa ngoba SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (bonisa phezu kwawo wonke amanye amawindi ohlelo lokusebenza) imvume ayizange inikezwe noma isikrini sedivayisi sicinyiwe.
Ukuze ufinyelele ikhamera ye-ultra-engeli ebanzi (ilens), ungasetha isici sokusondeza Lokhu kuyadingeka ukuze uthole isivinini esisekelwe ku-GPS esinembe kakhulu, kanye nekheli nezixhumanisi. Chofoza ukuze uthumele Imvume yendawo eqondile Kuyadingeka ukuze ukwazi ukubonisa isevisi yokurekhoda engemuva kanye nezimo kuphaneli yezaziso. Chofoza ukuze uthumele Imvume yesaziso
Ngeminikelo emincane, izikhangiso zikhishelwa esikrinini sasekhaya kuphelaphoto Izithombe
isithombe izithombe
Beka kuqala umsindo kulolu hlelo lokusebenza Uma inikwe amandla, ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza ngeke zikwazi ukusebenzisa imakrofoni. Uma lukhutshaziwe, lolu hlelo lokusebenza lungase lungakwazi ukurekhoda umsindo uma izinhlelo zokusebenza eziningi zisebenzisa imakrofoni (i-Android ayivumeli ngaso sonke isikhathi ukusetshenziswa kanyekanye kombhobho) Okwamanje, ukurekhodwa komsindo akunakwenzeka ngoba imakrofoni ibanjwe olunye uhlelo lokusebenza
Dala ifayela le-GPX kuvidiyo ngayinye Isilinganiso esincane sokubuyekeza se-GPX Zonke xhumanisa izibuyekezo
Engeza isinqamuleli (isiqalisi) Ukuqala/ukumisa ukurekhoda ngaphandle kokuvula isikrini esikhulu
Umkhiqizi wedivayisi angase anganikezi ngekhamera yelensi ebanzi kuzo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza Umkhiqizi wedivayisi angeke anikeze ngama-FPS angama-60 kuzo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza Ukushona kwelanga Isithwathwa Ibhishi (isimo sezulu esikhanyayo)
Imodi yokuvezwa okuzenzakalelayo Khubaza uma ufuna ukulawula mathupha ubude bozimele benzwa, isikhathi sokuchayeka, ukuzwela, nokuvuleka
Umkhiqizi wedivayisi angase anganikezi ukufinyelela kuwo wonke amakhamera, ngakho amanye angase angavuli
Yehlulekile ukuvula ikhamera ekhethiwe. Kwenzeka ukuthi akuwona wonke amakhamera afihliwe angasetshenziswa yinoma yiluphi uhlelo lokusebenza. Abakhiqizi abaningi bavumela kuphela ukusetshenziswa kwabo ezinhlelweni zabo zomdabu. Ikhamera ezenzakalelayo izovuleka.
Buza ukuthi imuphi umdlali okumele adlale ngaso sonke isikhathi\?
Okubalulekile kwe-GPS (Ibhethri noma Ukunemba) Ibhalansi phakathi kokunemba kwendawo (izixhumanisi), isivinini kanye nokusetshenziswa kwamandla ebhethri. Indawo enembe kakhulu (izixhumanisi) nesivinini ngenxa yokusetshenziswa kwamandla ebhethri okukhulu. Ukunemba okuphansi kwendawo (izixhumanisi) nesivinini ngenxa yokusetshenziswa kwamandla okuphansi kwebhethri.
Itholakala kuphela ku-Fused Location Provider API kanye nokunemba okuphezulu noma Isiphathi Sendawo
Ubumfihlo: Wonke amavidiyo owarekhodayo azolondolozwa kuphela kudivayisi yakho yasendaweni. Uhlelo lokusebenza aluwagcini amavidiyo akho (alunakho ukuxhumana neziphakeli)\n\nUhlelo lokusebenza luzoqhubeka nokusebenza ngemuva (isevisi yangaphambili evela kubha yezaziso) uma uqala ukurekhoda okusha bese ubuyela esikrinini sasekhaya, ushintshela kolunye uhlelo lokusebenza noma ukhiye ifoni yakho ukuze ukwazi ukuqhubeka nokurekhoda, noma uma uvula imisebenzi yokurekhoda okuzenzakalelayo (uma uvala isevisi yasemuva, le misebenzi ngeke isebenze).
Sicela uzame ukukhetha indlela ehlukile (isitoreji sasendaweni sedivayisi)
Ukudlidliza lapho uqala noma umisa ukurekhoda
Nikela nyanga zonke akukho ukukhangisa nganoma iyiphi imali Futhi, ukukhangisa kususwa ngokuphelele uma ubhalisa nganoma yiliphi inani. Susa izikhangiso unaphakade ngomnikelo wesikhathi esisodwa wanoma yiliphi inani. Ungakwazi futhi ukunikela nganoma iyiphi imali nyanga zonke ukuze ususe izikhangiso
Rekhoda umsindo kusuka kudivayisi ye-Bluetooth
